attributes.value: Finds artwork boring
Sees freedom and independence as completely worthless
Sees no value in holding back complaints and concealing emotions
Truly values merrymaking and parties
Finds those that develop skill with weapons and fighting distasteful
Sees working hard as a foolish waste of time
Believes war is preferable to peace in general
Never feels hatred toward anyone or anything
Has a very calm demeanor
Is brave in the face of imminent danger
Could not care less about her appearance, talents or other personal vanities
Thinks she is fairly important in the grand scheme of things
Is somewhat scatterbrained
Is very curious, sometimes to her detriment
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Tends to be a bit stubborn in changing her mind about things
Dislikes helping others
Is assertive to the point of aggression, unwilling to let others get a word in edgewise when she has something to say
Has an active imagination
Clumsy
Very flimsy
Poor analytical abilities
Quite poor focus
Bad intuition
A good spatial sense
A feel for music
A good kinesthetic sense
